term1: We collect personal information such as your name, email address, date of birth, and other details you provide during registration. This information is used to personalize your experience, improve our services, and communicate with you. By joining our social network, you consent to the collection and use of your data as outlined in this policy.
term2: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your data with trusted partners who work with us to provide services, under strict confidentiality agreements. We may also disclose your information if required by law or to protect our rights and safety.
term3: By posting content on our platform, you grant us a non-exclusive, royalty-free, worldwide license to use, display, and distribute your content. You are responsible for the content you share and agree not to post anything illegal, harmful, or in violation of our community guidelines.
term4: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account. We are not liable for any loss or damage resulting from your failure to secure your account.
term5: We may update this privacy policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or for legal, operational, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new policy on our platform and updating the date at the top of this document. Your continued use of our social network constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
I accept the terms and conditions: I accept the terms and conditions
issue_description: In today's society, women often face violence and sexual or physical abuse. Many of these women might not know how to deal with these issues or seek appropriate resources for help. Lack of awareness and proper support can complicate the situation and put women at greater risk.
solution_description: One effective solution to combat violence and abuse is to turn to social networks and share the issues. These platforms can provide a space for sharing experiences, receiving advice, and finding appropriate solutions. Raising awareness and creating a supportive community can help reduce these problems.
introduce_description: We introduce a new social network called We2, dedicated exclusively to issues related to violence and sexual and physical abuse. We2 offers various features, including creating relevant channels, educational videos, and a space for discussion and advice. Our goal is to create a safe and supportive environment for women to face these issues with more confidence and awareness.
introduce_we2: We2 is a new social network dedicated exclusively to issues related to violence and sexual and physical abuse. This platform offers various features, including creating educational channels, discussions on related topics, uploading videos and photos, and hosting educational classes and online meetings. We2 provides a safe and supportive environment, helping women face these issues with greater confidence and awareness, while benefiting from the experiences and advice of others.
